mapper.select: select ifnull((select enumvaluename from enumtable b where a.feetype=b.enumvalueid and b.enumtype='2006'),'') as feetypeenumvaluename, ifnull((select enumvaluename from enumtable b where a.paytype=b.enumvalueid and b.enumtype='1011'),'') as paytypeenumvaluename, ifnull((select name from transline b where a.lineid=b.id),'') as lineidname, ifnull((select boxsize from boxs b where a.boxtype=b.id),'') as boxtypeboxsize, ifnull((select enumvaluename from enumtable b where a.nodetype=b.enumvalueid and b.enumtype='2004'),'') as nodetypeenumvaluename, a.* from feeinfo a where id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from feeinfo where id in
#{id}
